info.title: Infrashop Order Management API
info.description: In this API documentation, you will find operations that you will call in order to manage the orders. Operations here includes managing sales targets. Feel free to browse through all of them and to try it for yourself!

tags.name: Authentication API
tags.description: Plain and simple authentication API. Just call it providing your username and password to retrieve your access token and your profile rights within Infracommerce order API. Use this token in all other API calls in Authorization header.

tags.name: Sales Target API
tags.description: The operations of Sales Targets API allows the management of sales targets where actions as fetching, updating and inseting data are possible.

tags.name: Sales Forecast API
tags.description: This API contains operations that will help you get sale forecast information.

tags.name: Order Feed API
tags.description: In this group you will find API operations to interact with order feed engine. You will find operations to retrieve updated orders, payment and order tracking events. After retrieving and processing the information, just call DELETE operation providing processed UUIDs in order to acknowledge them.

tags.name: Order & Payment Management API
tags.description: In this group you will find API operations to manage your orders. You will find operations to retrieve and create orders and their payments. In Order API, you will find two views of an order - a simple one, containing just a few information, and a complete one, that contains all data about the order.

tags.name: Tracking API
tags.description: This is Infrashop Trackings API documentation. Here you will find API operations to interact with infrashop tracking engine. You will be able to create tracking, query for tracking by several attributes (DeliveryId, ControlPointId, occurrenceDt, etc), update trackings and so on.

post.description:
Creates an order within Infrashop. You have to provide a complete order with the corresponding sale channel - each marketplace has its own sale channel and this attribute will define how this API behaves when validating and adding default data to the order.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Pedidos - Pedidos - Gravar

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid information provided. Please check error message for more details.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage rating informations.

get.description:
Retrieve a complete view of the order. This will return you all available information about the order, including trackings for its deliveries. Credit card information is masket for security reasons.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Pedidos - Pedidos - Consultar

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Order unique identifier

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid information provided. Please check error message for more details.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage rating informations.

404.description: Order not found. Please check error message for more details.

post.description:
Use this API to approve or reprove an order payment. Every time an order is paid (or refused), you should call this API to inform that this order should proceed with the fulfillment or be canceled.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Pedidos - API de Pagamentos - Gravar
Vendas - Pedidos - API de Pagamentos - Gravar - INT - Canal de Vendas

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid information provided. Please check error message for more details.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage rating informations.

404.description: Order or payment not found. Please check error message for more details.

get.description:
This API will retrieve the current payment status information.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Pedidos - API de Pagamentos - Consultar
Vendas - Pedidos - API de Pagamentos - Consultar - INT - Canal de Vendas

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: Order unique identifier

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: Payment unique identifier

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid information provided. Please check error message for more details.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage rating informations.

404.description: Order or payment not found. Please check error message for more details.

get.description: This API fetches all sales targets paginated.

parameters.name: saleChannelId
parameters.description: The SaleChannel's id. For example, if the sale channel is Internet, the id is "INT"; if is Teleshopping, the id is "TEL" etc.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The sales target date (in jersey date format) only with YEAR and MONTH, like "2016-06" for instance.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Starts with 0.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size. Cannot be higher than 20.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid parameter. Please check error message for more info.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage rating informations.

post.description: This API creates a new SaleTarget. This API will create a new SaleTarget using the posted data. All fields are required.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid parameter. Please check error message for more info.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage rating informations.

get.summary: Fetch the sale target by the composite id.
get.description: This API fetches a SaleTarget by its composite id (saleChannelId and date).

parameters.name: saleChannelId
parameters.description: The SaleChannel's id. For example, if the sale channel is Internet, the id is "INT"; if is Teleshopping, the id is "TEL" etc.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The sales target date (in jersey date format) only with YEAR and MONTH, like "2016-06" for instance.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid parameter. Please check error message for more info.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage rating informations.

404.description: SaleTarget not found. Please check error message for more info.

put.summary: Update a specific sale target by the composite id.
put.description: This API updates a specific SaleTarget by the composite id (saleChannelId and date). It is possible to update the "targetValue" and "expectedApprovalRate" of the SaleTarget.

parameters.name: saleChannelId
parameters.description: The SaleChannel's id. For example, if the sale channel is Internet, the id is "INT"; if is Teleshopping, the id is "TEL" etc.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The sales target date (in jersey date format) only with YEAR and MONTH, like "2016-06" for instance.

schema.description: This entity defines a SaleTarget entry

targetValue.description: The SaleTarget's value (that's the currencty target). Example: 1500

expectedApprovalRate.description: The expected approval rate of SaleTarget. Example: 65.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid parameter. Please check error message for more info.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage rating informations.

404.description: SaleTarget not found. Please check error message for more info.

get.description:
This API will give you sale forecast information.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Pedidos - Pedidos - Consultar

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid parameter. Please check error message for more info.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage rating informations.

404.description: Sale Forecast not found. Please check error message for more info.

post.description: Receives a order tracking event. This API operation should be called to inform the marketplace that this order is ready to be dispatched, was dipatched,  etc.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

204.description: The information was accepted by the marketplace and will be updated.

400.description: Invalid tracking information provided. Please check response messages.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot update tracking for these orders. Please check response messages.

get.description: Retrieve tracking data. This API operation will retrieve tracking data by deliveryId, controlPoint and Occurence Date.

parameters.name: deliveryId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for delivery

parameters.name: controlPointId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for controlPoint

parameters.name: occurrenceDate
parameters.description: The Occurrence Date of tracking

parameters.name: marketplaceId
parameters.description: If this attribute is "true" the tracking will contain the "orderId" and "deliveryId" from the marketplace, but if there is no order in the marketplace the response will contain the "normal" data.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid parameter. Please check error message for more info.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage rating informations.

404.description: SaleTarget not found. Please check error message for more info.

get.summary: Retrieve the tracking data in mode full view of tracking object.
get.description: Retrieve the tracking data in mode full view of tracking object. This API operation will retrieve tracking data by deliveryId, controlPoint and Occurence Date.

parameters.name: deliveryId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for delivery

parameters.name: controlPointId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for controlPoint

parameters.name: occurrenceDate
parameters.description: The Occurrence Date of tracking

parameters.name: marketplaceId
parameters.description: If this attribute is "true" the tracking will contain the "orderId" and "deliveryId" from the marketplace, but if there is no order in the marketplace the response will contain the "normal" data.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

400.description: Invalid parameter. Please check error message for more info.

403.description: User is not authorized. Please ensure that you have access to manage rating informations.

404.description: SaleTarget not found. Please check error message for more info.

get.summary: Retrieve the tracking data filtered by order id.
get.description:
Retrieve tracking data. This API operation will retrieve the order tracking data paginated.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Pedidos - Pedidos - Consultar

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The order unique identifier.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Starts with 0.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size. Cannot be higher than 20.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: The paginated list of trackings data.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot retrieve tracking data. Please check response messages.

get.summary: Retrieve the tracking data filtered by delivery id.
get.description:
Retrieve tracking data. This API operation will retrieve the delivery tracking data paginated.

Required Functionalities

Vendas - Pedidos - Pedidos - Consultar

parameters.name: deliveryId
parameters.description: The delivery unique identifier.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Starts with 0.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size. Cannot be higher than 20.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

200.description: The paginated list of trackings data.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot retrieve tracking data. Please check response messages.

SalesTargetListPagination.description: Standard pagination envelope response. SaleTarget entries will be available in "items".

links.description:
Collection of page links. You will find up to 5 links:
  • self - link to this same page
  • first - link to the first page
  • last - link to the last page
  • next - link to the next page. This will be only presented when there is a next page
  • previous - link to the previous page. This will be only presented when there is a previous page

totalForecastAmount.description: This is the current aggregated sale forecast

saleChannelForecastMap.description: This map contains the sale forecast for each sale channel.

SaleTarget.description: This entity defines a SaleTarget entry

saleChannelId.description: The SaleChannel's id. For example, if the sale channel is Internet, the id is "INT"; if is Teleshopping, the id is "TEL" etc.

date.description: The SaleTarget's date (in jersey date format) only with YEAR and MONTH, like "2016-06" for instance.

targetValue.description: The SaleTarget's value (that's the currencty target). Example: 1500.

expectedApprovalRate.description: The expected approval rate of SaleTarget. Example: 65.

OrderTrackingListPagination.description: Standard pagination envelope response. TrackingList entries will be available in "items".

links.description:
Collection of page links. You will find up to 5 links:
  • self - link to this same page
  • first - link to the first page
  • last - link to the last page
  • next - link to the next page. This will be only presented when there is a next page
  • previous - link to the previous page. This will be only presented when there is a previous page
